title: Rate My Peer
description: Full-Stack web and mobile application which assists instructors in tracking group progress using anonymous peer reviews.

title: ContactVault
description: Full-Stack web application designed to securely manage and organize personal contacts, ensuring privacy and efficient management.

title: Eventify (Ongoing)
description: Full-Stack event management platform designed to streamline the operations of student organizations at universities, enabling them to manage their events and activities more effectively and efficiently.
